description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

	New Features

SLIDESNET-12528	SaveToSVG method for PPTX
SLIDESNET-33314	Accessing document properties in a password protected presentation
SLIDESNET-33128	Support for embedding video in Presentation

Enhancements

SLIDESNET-29760	Provision of "All Caps" and "Small Caps" properties for slide text

	Investigations

SLIDESNET-32910	Generated PDF is extremely large as compared to source PPTX
SLIDESNET-33208	Difference in table rows heights from PPT and PPTX
SLIDESNET-33374	Aspose Slide AddOleObjectFrameshows false image as Embedded OLE Object
SLIDESNET-33387	Getting a large X on slides when using SlideEx GetThumbnail
SLIDESNET-33439	PPT/PPTX Speaker Notes - Aspose.Slides.Export.SaveFormat.PdfNotes

	Bugs

SLIDESNET-3100	PPTX file cannot be opened in PowerPoint after using AddAudioFrameCD method
SLIDESNET-29801	InvalidOperationException on accessing PPT with PresentationEx
SLIDESNET-29803	PptxException on accessing PPT with PresentationEx
SLIDESNET-29987	OleObjectFrame.ObjectData returns wrong data.
SLIDESNET-30983	ArgumentNullException on cloning slide
SLIDESNET-31189	After converting from PPT to PPTX PowerPoint finds unknown content
SLIDESNET-33258	Error while opening PPT presentations
SLIDESNET-33277	Argument Exception thrown on generating slide thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33285	Chart colors changed when generating slide thumbnail of cloned presentation
SLIDESNET-33305	AddEmptySlide() return error
SLIDESNET-33369	Page number (0) coming through in snapshots of some master pages
SLIDESNET-33405	Aspose.Slides generated presentation crashes PowerPoint 2010 when Save As option is used
SLIDESNET-33411	Incorrect conversion of ApsHyperlink object into PdfAnnotation objects in PdfPage.AddHyperlink method
SLIDESNET-33427	The title of a pie chart has wrong position and text
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
